name: Beautiful A320 Nighttime Chicago Approach!
description:
Welcome!  This is the fourth in a series of five flight videos relating to my trip to Denver with my wife Beth.  After enjoying a trip for our anniversary, it was time to head home to Louisville. 

This video covers the landing portion of our first leg home, from Denver International Airport to its fellow United Airlines hub, Chicago O'Hare International Airport.  We approached Chicago from the west, passed the airport and turned around over Lake Michigan, followed by a smooth landing on the airport's northernmost runway, 27R.

I did a complete, nine-concourse photo tour of Chicago O'Hare following a Windy City walk last March; read about it here!
http://www.milesbyfoot.com/2015/05/walking-windy-city-part-8.html

Thanks again for watching, and enjoy!

Flight Information
Airline: United Airlines
Flight Number: UA2027
Date of Flight: Sunday, November 1st, 2015

Origin Airport: Denver International Airport (KDEN/DEN)
Destination Airport: Chicago O'Hare International Airport (KORD/ORD)

Departing Gate: B46
Scheduled Departure: 15:14 MST
Actual Departure from Gate: 15:15 MST
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 8 / 15:37 MST
Landing Runway and Time: RWY 27R / 18:25 CST
Scheduled Arrival: 18:40 CST
Actual Arrival at Gate: 18:38 EDT
Arriving Gate: C17

Aircraft Information
Type: Airbus A320-232
Registration: N471UA
Aircraft Delivery: March 2001
Engines: 2x International Aero Engines V2527-A5
Seat/s: 27A & 27B

Video Highlights and Timeline
09:30 - Landing

Technical Specs
Camera: Nikon D3200 with 18-55mm lenses

A big thanks to my wife Beth as my cameraperson throughout the journey, and particularly for this segment!

This video is the sole property of www.milesbyfoot.com.  Any unauthorized use of the video or audio content from this video is prohibited.  If you'd like to use any portion of this video, please e-mail me at milesbyfoot@gmail.com and I'll be happy work with you!
